name: Laser Recoil Jaunt
description:
PLEASE READ as I did not implement a tutorial... Get to the goal (the blue square) by firing your laser to recoil backwards! The rules/controls:

  • Use ARROW KEYS to point in a direction, and SPACE to fire a laser
  • You will recoil backwards one grid space, or two if you're directly facing a wall (black square, or edges of room) or a box (brown square). Running into a wall or box will stop your movement
  • If you fire at a mirror (the gray rectangle), it will reflect and destroy you
  • Use the B key to drop a box into the grid space you are facing. A box will act like a wall, but will be destroyed after one laser hit
  • You have limited laser shots ("L:__") and boxes to drop ("B:__"). If you run out of lasers before reaching the goal, you will have to retry
  • The R key will restart a level at any time

Made by me in GameMaker Studio for LOWREZJAM 2020. Based on the theme of "Recoil"

Font used is Little Conquest by Jack Oatley: https://jackoatley.itch.io/ikkle-font-pack
